title: Drawing, "Design for a fan: Worship of Venus by Art", 1750–70
medium: Pencil, pen and ink, brown wash
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Before a classic portico, a female figure with the attributes of the Visual Arts kneels in adoration before a statue of Venus. Cupid flies above. Other figures, including a river god at lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a fan: Worship of Venus by Art", 1750–70.
1750–70. Pencil, pen and ink, brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6648.
